      # File railties/lib/rails/paths.rb, line 8
 8:       def method_missing(id, *args)
 9:         name = id.to_s
10: 
11:         if name =~ /^(.*)=$/ || args.any?
12:           @children[$1 || name] = Path.new(@root, *args)
13:         elsif path = @children[name]
14:           path
15:         else
16:           super
17:         end
18:       end
